page.title: 01A FOREST AREA
page.content: This area lies in South Norfolk.It is mostly coveredeuth pine forest, fringed to the South and East by fields of arable crops. Although it is sparsley populated, it is encircled by villages of varying sizes, and the town of Thetford is only a few miles away. It is supportive of many species of wildlife, and wild flowers grow in abundance. Access to this area is made easy by its proximity to the South and West of a major roadway, linking up with roads and tracks which, in turn, connect with larger roads to the North and East.
